name: InstaTest

nodes.name: Set your system promt for AI
nodes.notes: In this node in "prompt" variable you can set your system prompt

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value:
=Persona: You are a instagram influencer.
Context: You receive a messages from your subscribers
Task: Answer questions in your writing style and patterns according to your previous posts text. Use your post only for style and patterns reference.
Style rules:
simple answers

nodes.name: Local n8n memory

nodes.name: ChatGPT model
nodes.notes: This lmChatOpenAi node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Send respond
nodes.notes: This respondToWebhook node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Easy Instagram(via ManyChat) bot
---
### Description:
This template is a main part of Entire solution. It's getting new message from Instagram via ManyChat(Extra No-Code tool for getting and sending message in Instagram). Generating message using ChatGPT and send back to ManyChat that sends it to Instagrtam.

### Logic:
1. Getting message from Instagram(from ManyChat)
2. Set you system prompt for AI
3. Create simple answer for message in AI block
4. Send answer to Instagram(to ManyChat)

---
*Helpful links:*
- [Guide in Notion how to create full bot]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
- [ManyChat]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}

parameters.content:
## 3) AI block
---
There is 3 nodes:
- AI Agent
- Chat GPT model
- Memory for history messages

### To do:
- in ChatGPT node you can choose the best model for you
- in Memory Block you can change number of messages in history

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# InstaTest

## Overview
Automated workflow: InstaTest. This workflow integrates 8 different services: webhook, stickyNote, agent, respondToWebhook, set. It contains 16 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 16
- **Node Types**: 8
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Set your system promt for AI**: set
- **Local n8n memory**: memoryBufferWindow
- **ChatGPT model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Send respond **: respondToWebhook
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Getting message from Instagram**: webhook
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **AI Agent**: agent
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- ... and 6 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
